items.content_html: Building a datalake for semi-structured data or json has always been challenging. Imagine if the json documents are streaming or continuously flowing from healthcare vendors then we need a robust modern architecture that can deal with such a high volume. At the same time analytics layer also needs to be created so as to generate value from it.

I am writing this to give answers to these types of questions.

items.content_html: Posted by Ramki Gummadi, Software Engineer, Google and Kevin Chen, Software Engineer, YouTube      Caching is a ubiquitous idea in computer science that significantly improves the performance of storage and retrieval systems by storing a subset of popular items closer to the client based on request patterns. An important algorithmic piece of cache management is the decision policy used for dynamically updating the set of items being stored, which has been extensively optimized over several decad...
